metadata.title: HummyTummy - Restaurant Management System
metadata.description: Modern POS system for restaurants. Manage orders, kitchen display, tables, and payments all in one place.
metadata.keywords: restaurant pos, kitchen display system, restaurant management, qr menu, table management

hero.headline: The operating system for
hero.subtitle: Streamline orders, manage your floor, and grow your business with HummyTummy's all-in-one restaurant management platform.

product.title: Everything you need to run a modern restaurant
product.subtitle: From taking orders to managing your kitchen, HummyTummy gives you complete control over your restaurant operations. No more juggling multiple tools or losing track of orders.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Process orders in seconds, not minutes. Optimized for speed.

insights.title: Actionable Insights
insights.description: Real-time analytics to grow your business.

features.title: Built for how restaurants actually work
features.subtitle: Every feature designed with restaurant owners, managers, and staff in mind.

qrMenu.title: QR Menu
qrMenu.description: Create beautiful digital menus that customers can scan and browse instantly. Update prices and items in real-time without reprinting.
bullets: Instant menu updates, zero printing costs

orderManagement.title: Order & Table Management
orderManagement.description: Get a real-time bird's eye view of your entire floor. Track table status, manage reservations, and optimize seating.
bullets: Visual floor plan with live table status

posPayments.title: POS & Payments
posPayments.description: Fast, reliable point of sale with support for all payment methods. Split bills, apply discounts, and close tabs in seconds.
bullets: Accept cards, cash, and mobile payments
Easy bill splitting and item transfers

kitchenFlow.title: Staff & Kitchen Flow
kitchenFlow.description: Digital kitchen display system that eliminates paper tickets. Prioritize orders, track cook times, and coordinate your team.

multiBranch.title: Multi-Branch Control
multiBranch.description: Manage all your locations from a single dashboard. Standardize menus, monitor performance, and scale your business.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing.trialNote: All plans include 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

business.title: Real impact on your bottom line
business.subtitle: HummyTummy customers see measurable improvements from day one.

time.title: Save Time
time.description: Automate repetitive tasks and streamline your workflow. Spend less time on admin and more time with customers.

errors.title: Reduce Errors
errors.description: Digital order flow eliminates miscommunication. Orders go directly from table to kitchen with zero confusion.

revenue.title: Increase Revenue
revenue.description: Faster service means more customers served. Real-time insights help you optimize for maximum profitability.

security.title: Enterprise-grade security for every restaurant
security.subtitle: Your data is your business. We take security seriously so you can focus on what matters most—serving your customers.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard AES-256 encryption.

rbac.title: Role-Based Access Control
rbac.description: Fine-grained permissions let you control exactly what each team member can see and do.

uptime.title: 99.9% Uptime SLA
uptime.description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with redundancy across multiple data centers.

compliance.title: GDPR & KVKK Compliant
compliance.description: Full compliance with European and Turkish data protection regulations.

visual.title: Your Data is Protected
visual.subtitle: Industry-leading security measures keep your business safe.

cta.subtitle: Join {count} restaurants already using HummyTummy to streamline operations and grow their business.
